text: Can you just make a repeater but set the min and max and default amount of items to 5 or however many you want?

The grey scale images (phone and social icons) are built the same way as the image above. Why aren't the images responsive as the image above? I would appreciate if someone could answer me this question.

I am experiencing buggy behavior with published modules that are on live pages if I update them and republish:
_Here is a simplified example:_ 
• The original module contains a text field `module.text_field` . 
• I added a boolean `module.show_text` , set it to true by default, then put the conditional in the hubl to show the text if true.
When I republish the module, the content disappears on ALL LIVE PAGES. I have to go into each module on EVERY PAGE and toggle the `module.show_text` off and on again, then it shows on the page.
Sorry for the all caps lol
This has happened with more than one module and in multiple portals

Sorry to do this… cc: <@U6GNQ7JBU> <@UG52C29EE>
just wondering if this is a quick fix on y’alls end
